item.title: RHOP Taglines + Lake Bell (Author of Inside Voice/Actor)
item.itunes:title: RHOP Taglines + Lake Bell (Author of Inside Voice/Actor)
item.description:
Happy Halloween week! Danny starts by touching down on The Real Housewives of Potomac taglines and the family fun day that included talks of threesomes and vasectomies! After RHOP, Danny welcomes actor/author/director Lake Bell to talk about her new audiobook (INSIDE VOICE: MY OBSESSION WITH HOW WE SOUND, out November 1 wherever you listen to audiobooks), working with Nancy Meyers on It's Complicated, and SO much more!!!


Lake Bell Interview: 15:30ish

item.title: RHOSLC Angie's Performance Art + RHOBH REUNION PART 3!
item.itunes:title: RHOSLC Angie's Performance Art + RHOBH REUNION PART 3!
item.description:
Danny recaps The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the triumphant return of one of the Angies, plus a ski trip, and a New York detour that unfortunately didn't include the Countess. Over on The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, the THRILLING final part of the reunion aired, with Kathy joining the gals on stage! That's showbiz! What a week! Congrats to all who made it to the end of RHOBH this year, may we all prosper! xoxo


RHOBH Recap: 36:30ish

Watch White Hot on Netflix April 19!

item.title: BONUS: And Just Like That Recap (with Naomi Ekperigin)
item.itunes:title: BONUS: And Just Like That Recap (with Naomi Ekperigin)
item.description:
In this special bonus episode of Everything Iconic, Danny and special guest/comedian Naomi Ekperigin dive in to the HBO series And Just Like That. 7 episodes have aired, and it's been a wild ride--kitchen fingers, wetting the bed, comedy concerts, Steve's decline, Charlotte's tennis, and so much more have already happened. Danny and Naomi discuss how far we've come, and what they think has worked and what hasn't. Danny also touches on The Way We Were, the 1970s classic with Barbra Streisand and Robert Redford!


Check out Naomi's new Netflix special The Standups, watch her on Mythic Quest on Apple and follow her on Instagram (@Blacktresscomedy)!

item.itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps one of the greatest episodes in Real Housewives her-story! On The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, one of the women is on the run from the feds, while the others take a vacation bus to Vail, where they will meet up with Mary and Meredith...
item.description:
Danny recaps one of the greatest episodes in Real Housewives her-story! On The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, one of the women is on the run from the feds, while the others take a vacation bus to Vail, where they will meet up with Mary and Meredith, who is soaking in a bathtub for hours with a smile on her face and a bubble beard on her chin. The cast pieces together Jen's sha-stories, while Ms. Shah (allegedly) pieces together her bail in an episode that is anything but #FridayEnergy.


Danny also briefly touches on the RHOP reunion part 2 (44:00ish minutes in).


PREORDER DANNY'S NEW BOOK HERE: http://smarturl.it/unremember

item.description:
Danny welcomes Kyle Richards, one of the stars of Halloween Kills, in theaters and on Peacock October 15. Kyle talks about reprising her role from the original Halloween, her upcoming holiday movie, plus answers some questions about this season of The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, including a little reunion dish. After that, Danny sits down with Lisa Ling to discuss her brilliant series This Is Life with Lisa Ling on CNN, tells me what it was like to sit next to Barbara Walters on The View, the impact of social media on journalism, and more!


Lisa Ling: 22:00ish

item.description:
Danny recaps this week's The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured more ice fishing, a casino night, and a Mary meme that would be impossible to explain to non-watchers. On The Real Housewives of Potomac, the women go on a couples trip where Gordon reveals more about himself, salad gets thrown, and the cast does a lot of GVO work. This week's pod also features lots of 90s references to The Mighty Ducks, Titanic, Britney, and Katie Holmes.

item.description:
Danny talks about Bethenny's new HBO show, the Demi/frozen yogurt feud (NOTE/Trigger Warning: this conversation includes a brief discussion on eating disorders and food triggers), and then dives into this week's The Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a book event on a yacht and the moms coming together. On The Real Housewives of Dallas the editors get creative with the 80s. After the recaps, Danny is joined by Shut Up Evan host Evan Ross Katz (@evanrosskatz) to talk about Tara Reid, Anna Faris, the current state of Housewives, Colton from The Bachelor's coming out, and lots more.

item.description:
Danny welcomes D'Andra Simmons from The Real Housewives of Dallas to talk about this week's episode, which featured a fight at Tiffany's birthday party, meditation, and Mama Dee! D'Andra lets us know how she feels about the rest of the cast's treatment of Tiffany, what happened with Jen Davis, her relationship with the other women, and LOTS more!

Then, stars of Breaking News In Yuba County (out Feb. 12) Mila Kunis and Juliette Lewis stop by to talk about RHOBH, The Other Sister, a new Bad Mom's movie, and more! After RHOSLC, Danny talks this week's Real Housewives of Dallas!

item.description:
Danny is joined with Matt Rogers and Dave Mizzoni of Gayme Show for the Real Housewives of Potomac reunion recap! They discuss the fashion of it all, Monique's binder, music, and more. They also dive into Prom on Netflix. Danny then recaps this week's Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured the introduction of TWO new cast members.


Prom: 36:42ish

RHOA: 50:50ish

item.title: RHOSLC Mary Didn't Know + TJ Lavin (The Challenge) & Kaitlyn Bristowe (Bachelor Nation/DWTS)
item.itunes:title: RHOSLC Mary Didn't Know + TJ Lavin (The Challenge) & Kaitlyn Bristowe (Bachelor Nation/DWTS)
item.itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the wives finishing up their Valter Met Gala luncheon, and dealing with marriage struggles. After the recap, Danny chats with longtime host of MTV's The Challenge abou...
item.description:
Danny recaps this week's Real Housewives of Salt Lake City, which featured the wives finishing up their Valter Met Gala luncheon, and dealing with marriage struggles. After the recap, Danny chats with longtime host of MTV's The Challenge about the history of the show and what's to come on the new season. Finally, Danny talks to Kaitlyn Bristowe from Bachelor Nation about her thoughts on the Tayshia/Clair season, producers setting up Clair, working with Tyra on Dancing with the Stars, and more! You can watch the interviews at youtube.com/DannyPellegrino1.


TJ Lavin Interview: 26:24ish

Kaitlyn Bristowe Interview: 101:24ish


Buy Everything Iconic merch at EverythingIconic.store

item.description:
Danny discusses all the Bravo news-- J*x let go, Braunwyn comes out, and Erika/Tom in hot water! Then he recaps the premiere of Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of bubbie work, wedding planning, activism, and more! On The Real Housewives of Potomac finale, Michael unravels with the news of a Juan engagement, and Karen does HSN.


RHOA Recap: 7:48ish

RHOP Recap: 27:08ish

On RHONY, the women head to Fashion Week, Tinsley gets her "IT" back, and Sonja shows off her grey sweatpant collection.

item.title: Iconic Bitch Sesh
item.itunes:title: Iconic Bitch Sesh
item.itunes:subtitle: Two worlds and two shows are finally coming together to form the crossover episode of our dreams. That's right, Bitch Sesh and Everything Iconic have joined together for one special episode to talk about the rise of Denise Richards, the fall of Va...
item.description:
Two worlds and two shows are finally coming together to form the crossover episode of our dreams. That's right, Bitch Sesh and Everything Iconic have joined together for one special episode to talk about the rise of Denise Richards, the fall of Vanderpump Rules, a reconsideration of Leah's bucket hat , and the amazing entrance of one Garcelle Beauvais. A super-sized, super-packed episode that has everything except a ghostly voice-over from Lisa Vanderpump. Stay safe, stay home and goodnight from the lower level.


Special thanks to all the frontline workers! We love you. <3

item.itunes:subtitle: In a very special two-part episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with an iconic lineup of Bravolebrities who all call in to help us all stay sane during our social distancing! He chats with Dorinda Medley from RHONY, Lisa Rinna from RHOBH, Monique ...
item.description:
In a very special two-part episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with an iconic lineup of Bravolebrities who all call in to help us all stay sane during our social distancing! He chats with Dorinda Medley from RHONY, Lisa Rinna from RHOBH, Monique Samuels from RHOP, Jackie Goldschneider from RHONJ, Braunwyn from RHOC, Kate Chastain from Below Deck, Patricia Altschul from Southern Charm, Ariana Madix and Scheana Shay from Vanderpump Rules, and maybe even a few more! So fire up the podcast app and stay inside/hang with us for some uplifting words, gossip, and laughs. Part 2 out next week.


Part 1 includes:

Dorinda RHONY: 5:38ish

Jackie RHONJ: 17:44ish

Lisa Rinna RHOBH: 31:38ish

Ariana PumpRules: 43:41ish

Monique RHOP: 1:00:06ish

It's the last Bravo recaps of 2019! Danny dives into Real Housewives of Atlanta, which features a joyful Marlo/Porsha excursion. On Orange County, the women have their finale and then all hell breaks loose as Vicki braves her first reunion as a friend of. On Jersey, Danny sobbed through Easter with the Gorgas. Finally, Dallas celebrates their finale with some tough-to-watch storylines.


RHOA: 6:16ish

RHOC: 19:50ish

RHONJ: 36:27ish

RHOD: 49:48ish

item.title: Red for Reads on RHOA + Vacationing with RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD!
item.itunes:title: Red for Reads on RHOA + Vacationing with RHOC, RHONJ, & RHOD!
item.itunes:subtitle: Danny is breaking down RHOA, RHOC, RHONJ, and RHOD! LOTS of Housewives. On Atlanta, we explore the music budget and the Reads in Red party at Lake Bailey. Over on OC, the women are in Florida. Tamra pulls out her boobs twice this episode, likely leavin...
item.description:
Danny is breaking down RHOA, RHOC, RHONJ, and RHOD! LOTS of Housewives. On Atlanta, we explore the music budget and the Reads in Red party at Lake Bailey. Over on OC, the women are in Florida. Tamra pulls out her boobs twice this episode, likely leaving the Bravo editor who has to censor her every episode exhausted. In New Jersey, Marge tries comedy and the women ride horses in poop water. Finally, the Dallas group is entering the red light district and watching sports.


RHOA- 6:55ish

RHOC- 21:51ish

RHONJ- 40:50ish

RHOD- 52:02ish

item.itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps all four Housewives franchises that are currently airing. He starts with the season premiere of The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of babies and the return of Kenya. Then we head to OC where the women begin to question Tam...
item.description:
Danny recaps all four Housewives franchises that are currently airing. He starts with the season premiere of The Real Housewives of Atlanta, which featured lots of babies and the return of Kenya. Then we head to OC where the women begin to question Tamra's motives. In the premiere of New Jersey, we are reacquainted with the wives at a surgery party. Finally, LeeAnne gets married on Real Housewives of Dallas.


#RHOA: 6:10ish

#RHOC: 24:03ish

#RHONJ: 40:10

In this VERY special bonus episode, Beverly D'Angelo, most known for her work as Ellen Griswold in the Vacation film franchise and who also acted in Hair, Entourage, Coal Miner's Daughter, and so much more, sits down with Danny to talk about her iconic film career, how the industry has changed, plus her work as a singer and an illustrator. He also co-wrote other legendary Mariah songs like "Hero," "Anytime You Need A Friend," "Forever," "Miss You Most (At Christmas Time)", "Butterfly," "My All," "One Sweet Day," and SO many more. item.description:
In this Everything Iconic POP Dive, Danny & his BFF Jillian Corbets deep dive into 1997's My Best Friend's Wedding. Julia Roberts & Dermot Mulroney will reunite this fall for the 3rd time on Amazon's "Homecoming," but we take a look back at their iconic first onscreen pairing alongside Cameron Diaz & Rupert Everett. Jessica Green (host of "The Big Day - Real Talk About Real Weddings" podcast) also stops by for a wedding-themed lightning round.
